mapper.select: SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_admin.phone FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_admin ON tb_user.id = tb_admin.id WHERE tb_user.uname = #{uname} AND tb_user.password = #{password} AND tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 1

SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_teacher.*,tb_teacher.school_id AS schoolId FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id WHERE tb_user.uname = #{uname} AND tb_user.password = #{password} AND tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 2

SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_student INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_student.id = tb_user.id INNER JOIN tb_student_group ON tb_student_group.student_id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_group ON tb_group.id = tb_student_group.group_id WHERE tb_group.id = #{groupId}
SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_student INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_student.id = tb_user.id WHERE tb_user.name = #{name} AND tb_student.number = #{number}

SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_student_group INNER JOIN tb_user ON tb_student_group.student_id = tb_user.id INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_group ON tb_student_group.group_id = tb_group.id WHERE tb_group.id = #{id}

SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_user INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id WHERE tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 3 AND tb_student.number=#{number} AND tb_user.name = #{name}

SELECT tb_user.id,tb_user.uname,tb_user.name,tb_user.email,tb_user.sex,is_active,role,tb_user.ctime, tb_school.id AS schoolId,tb_school.name AS schoolName,idcard,tb_teacher.phone AS phone FROM tb_user INNER JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_teacher.school_id = tb_school.id WHERE tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 2 ORDER BY tb_user.id
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_student SET score = score+#{score} WHERE id = #{studentId} AND score>=0
mapper.select: SELECT tb_student.* FROM tb_student WHERE id=#{studentId}
